hero.title: Centro
hero.lead: A revolution in online jewelry. The best shopping experience and unique pieces with fast, secure delivery.

specialties.title: Our specialties
specialties.subtitle: The experience of our team and our years of experience have allowed us to develop an extensive network of suppliers, ensuring that our clients always get what they are looking for.

clients.title: 1M+ loyal customers
clients.desc: Trust and proven quality from our community.

shipping.title: Free shipping across Peru
shipping.desc: Safe and fast delivery to your door.

brands.title: Local brands
brands.desc: We partner with top local brands.

band.title: Trusted by thousands across Peru
band.desc: We work with reliable couriers so your jewelry arrives safe and on time.

story.title: Across the country
story.body: Our passion for jewelry helped us build a trusted supplier network. Find unique, quality pieces wherever you are.

contact.lead: Questions? Get in touch or visit us to know more!
